thread.title: Omni-ID Adds to Executive Leadership Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Omni-ID Adds to Executive Leadership Team
text:
ROCHESTER, N.Y., Feb. 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Omni-ID, the world’s #1 supplier of RFID tags and Industrial IoT solutions has announced that James Dole has recently retired as the company’s Chief Financial Officer and has been replaced by Mag Saba.
This is the second appointment that the company has made to its senior management team in the past 12 months. Automation software industry veteran John Kelly was named Senior Vice President of Sales in mid-2017. John is responsible for Omni-ID’s global sales and sales implementation & operations teams.
Mr. Kelly joins Omni-ID from Revitas, where he was the Senior Vice President of Global Sales. John brings extensive global experience in growing programs and selling software solutions into the manufacturing sector. He has held various senior sales management positions at companies such as Oracle Corporation, Siebel Systems, JDA Software and SunGard.
Mag Saba, recently appointed Chief Financial Officer, joins Omni-ID from American Aerogel Corporation, a leading provider of thermal insulation solutions to the temperature-controlled segment of the bio-pharmaceuticals industry where he was the Chief Financial Officer. He has held several executive roles at Bausch & Lomb Inc, including CFO positions for their Asia-Pacific, and “America’s” Divisions.
“I am very pleased to welcome Mag to the Omni-ID team,” said George E. Daddis, Jr. PhD, CEO of Omni-ID. “Mag is a seasoned finance executive and corporate officer with a demonstrated background in corporate strategy and financial management. He brings extensive global experience combining corporate and international assignments as Chief Financial Officer, and organizational leadership in both public company and private equity environments.”
Full bios for both Mag Saba and John Kelly along with additional company information can be found at www.omni-id.com .
About Omni-ID
Based in Rochester, NY, Omni-ID has developed original, patented technologies for on-metal and visual tagging to enable a broad range of applications to improve asset tracking, supply chain management and material flow management. Omni-ID is the leading supplier of RFID tags and ProVIEW material flow management solutions for Manufacturing & Logistics, Energy, IT Assets and Tool Tracking. Omni-ID’s versatile family of products provides a complete range of tags and solutions for tracking and identification challenges, with unprecedented accuracy, in any environment. For more information, visit www.omni-id.com .
